Token.Abstract: The TICDSDocumentRegistrationOperationDelegate protocol defines the methods implemented by delegates of TICDSDocumentRegistrationOperation or one of its subclasses. In the TICoreDataSync framework, these delegate methods are implemented by the document sync manager.

Informs the delegate that the operation has been paused because the remote document file structure does not exist. The delegate should query its own delegate to ask whether to continue registration by creating the structure.

Parameter.Name: anOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the operation has resumed after being told whether or not to create the remote document file structure.

Parameter.Name: anOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation object that sent the message.
